content: on the needles length and pattern following knit back and forth in row following chart a for a total of 219 row approximately 80 cm binding oy set a new reference point for the bind-os row 1 sl1 work 20 stitches following the pattern k2tog purl the last stitch row 2 knit according to the pattern row 3 sl1 work 19 stitches according to the pattern k2tog purl the last stitch row 4 knit according to the pattern repeat this process binding os 1 stitch every second row until 4 stitches remain the original cast-on count knit two additional row following the pattern then bind os the remaining stitches finishing your mini scarf is now complete wash the scarf squeeze out the excess water and lay it flat on a towel to dry stretch it slightly lengthwise to ensure the scarf gains additional length when using drops air yarn the scarf should stretch to about 140 cm after washing if using a diserent yarn the length may vary 2 author veronika stončus / stoncusknit this description
